scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:login" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:student"
scripts.build: npm run build:login && npm run build:admin && npm run build:student
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:login" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:student"
scripts.install:all: cd login && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../../student && npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
